DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , 3-treatment , 3-period , crossover , single-dose study healthy subject . Eighteen ( 18 ) subject complete study ; dropout may replace discretion sponsor . Three treatment : Treatment A : Revatio 20 mg intact tablet . Treatment B : Revatio 20 mg crush tablet mixed apple sauce . Treatment C : Revatio 20 mg extemporaneously prepared suspension ( EP ) . Blood sample analysis sildenafil plasma obtain pre-dose 14 hour post dose period . Tolerability safety assess reported adverse event study period .
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study Revatio Crushed Tablets , Extemporaneously Prepared Formulation , Intact Tablets 20 mg Dose Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male/female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , ocular allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding Screening . History febrile illness within 5 day prior first dose . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
